name: Avoid empty Functions, Forms and Modules
description: This metric retrieves all ABAP Functions, ABAP Forms, and ABAP Modules that contain no statements.
output:
This report lists all ABAP Functions, ABAP Forms, and ABAP Modules that contain no statements. 
It provides the following information:
- ABAP Functions/Forms/Modules full name
rationale: For maintainability aspect, avoid ABAP Functions, ABAP Forms, and ABAP Modules that contain no statements.
remediation: Check if the object is referenced. If not then remove it.
total: Number of ABAP Functions, ABAP Forms, and ABAP Modules
